comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0

when using the download manager and Alt-Clicking a link, the download manager still focuses even when the focusWhenStarting key is set to "false", the default.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Open page with links
2.Alt-click link to download


Actual Results:  
Download window opens on top of browser

Expected Results:  
Download windows opens behind browser

comments.creator: andrei.domuta@softvision.ro
comments.author: andrei.domuta@softvision.ro

comments.text: if i choose focusWhenStarting=false, i expect it not to focus in ALL conditions, content-disposition:attachment, alt-clicking, etc. if i alt-click, having the download manager focus is inconvenient, i'm often alt-clicking many items.
